data.name: Cookie Gardening Demo
data.description:
Full version here: 
https://www.meta.com/en-gb/experiences/5368758349867888

Explore a lovingly hand-crafted world full of swift carrots, weirdly aggressive tomatoes, and potatoes who are just trying their best. 

Help a little turnip who works in an office!
Support a small business run by a carrot in a hat! 
Decorate a cute home to share with your favorite veggies!

And never forget: you're surrounded by friends.

Join the Cookie Gardening Discord for updates: https://discord.gg/Stw3W2xHv3

(Please note, there's currently no way to transfer your save file from the demo to the full version.)

changelog.change_log: Fixed tutorial text in one-handed mode, and improved stuffed carrot grab.
Fixed winter garden baked lighting and removed debug cookies.
Fixed heartbeat bug.
Added little veggie heartbeat. Made globe icons slightly simpler to improve performance.
Lots of art, UI, and interaction updates.

Fixed office tutorial bug. Made challenges that unlock new areas appear more frequently. Made broccoli a bit better at moving. Adjusted terrarium to prevent veggies from climbing out. Fixed garden lightmaps. Typo fixes and text size adjustments. Added hint to office veggie sign. Fixed terrarium veggies disappearing if they fell off the map. Fixed mushroom and broccoli being too large while growing.
Edits to terrarium music.
Added new music to Terrarium. Reduced music volume in Title Screen. Removed desert from demo version.
Added new music to title screen.
Fixed bug in which counters in office wouldn't change when veggies were correctly placed in basket. Added more dialogue to Office Turnip.
Redecorated Office and made UI easier to understand. Made storage basket stop disappearing when full. Improved framerate in main garden.
Made it easier to grab objects like baskets, stuffed carrot, and net.
Added more instructions to office tutorial. Added demo label to title screen.
Replaced per-veggie limit in terrarium with overall limit, and made limit more clear in the UI.
Fixed missing images.
Made changes to broccoli and mushrooms. Swapped out broccoli sound effects. Added more wallpapers/carpets/furniture textures. Edited player position and tracking.
Moved ground higher if played while standing. Added environment to title screen. Veggies now spawn with unique eyelid colors. Added more furniture/wallpaper/carpet patterns.
Added gingerbread to title screen.
Veggies now spawn with different eyelid colors. Furniture icons in shoppe are lighter and easier to see.
Removed experimental setting temporarily.
